Cart.add_some_products: Add some products to get started

HomePage.subtitle: for residential & trade customers
HomePage.description: Premium wooden flooring at unbeatable prices. Order free samples, shop online, or explore our personalized flooring solutions.
HomePage.floor_update_message: Think updating your floor is expensive? Think again! Explore our collection of affordable and high-quality engineered wooden coverings and transform your space without exceeding your budget.

Categories.wood_description: Natural wood flooring for a classic look
Categories.panels_description: Stylish and functional panels for interior and exterior applications
Categories.thresholds_description: Durable thresholds for smooth transitions between flooring types
Categories.cladding_description: Elegant and weather-resistant cladding for exterior walls
Categories.cleaning_description: Specialized cleaning products for maintaining your flooring

Footer.about_us_content: We are a leading provider of high-quality parquet flooring. With over 10 years of experience, we offer a wide range of wood types, finishes, and styles to suit any interior. Our mission is to bring elegance and durability to your home.
Footer.services_content: Our services include parquet installation, restoration, and maintenance. We also provide free consultations to help you choose the perfect flooring for your space. Let us transform your floors into works of art!
Footer.contact_content: For any inquiries, feel free to reach out to us via email or phone. Visit our store at 123 Main St, City, Country, or fill out the contact form on our website. We're here to help!
Footer.privacy_policy_content: We respect your privacy. Your personal information is securely stored and will never be shared with third parties without your consent. For more details, please read our full Privacy Policy.

ContactContent.branch_description: A large and impressive store with exclusive solutions
ContactContent.quick_contact: For quick contact with the branch

About.intro_question: Think updating your floor is expensive? Think again! At Effect Parquet, we specialize in affordable and high-quality engineered wooden coverings that transform your space without exceeding your budget.
About.experience_text: With years of experience and more than 1000 satisfied clients, we have established ourselves as a leading provider of premium flooring solutions. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has made us the go-to choice for homeowners and businesses alike.
About.mission_text: To provide exceptional flooring solutions that combine quality, affordability, and style, helping our clients create beautiful spaces they love.
About.values_text: Quality craftsmanship, transparent pricing, customer satisfaction, and sustainable practices are at the core of everything we do.

Services.service_1_description: Premium quality engineered wooden coverings that combine durability with natural beauty. Perfect for any room in your home or office.
Services.service_2_description: Expert installation services ensuring your new floor is perfectly laid and ready to enjoy for years to come.
Services.cta_description: Contact us today for a consultation and discover how affordable premium flooring can be.

Terms.intro_description: Welcome to "Effect Parquet" (hereinafter: the "Site") at the Internet address effectparquet.com. The Site is operated by Effect Parquet (hereinafter: the "Site Management" or the "Company").
Terms.intro_subtitle: The Site serves as a catalog and e-commerce site that offers various flooring products for sale (hereinafter: the 'Products').
Terms.general_1: The provisions of these regulations apply equally to both sexes, and the use of the masculine form is for convenience only.
Terms.general_2: The provisions of these regulations and the terms of use that appear on the site define the legal relationship between the customer and the site, the terms of use of the site and/or ordering of products from the site indicates the customer's agreement to these terms and additional terms that appear on the site.
Terms.general_3: The Company may at any time, at its sole discretion, update these regulations.
Terms.general_4: These terms apply to the use of the site and the services included therein via any computer or other communication device (such as a cell phone, various tablets, etc.).
Terms.general_5: The company and the site management do their best to present the most complete and comprehensive information regarding the product, including images, although it is clarified that there may appear on the site in good faith inaccuracies and/or errors and/or omissions, and the company will not bear any responsibility arising from the inaccuracies and/or errors.
Terms.general_6: The product images on the site are for illustrative purposes only. There may be differences in appearance, color, size, etc. between the product as displayed on the site and the product in reality.
Terms.general_7: You may not copy and use, or allow others to use, the contents of the site for any other purpose without prior written permission.
Terms.registration_1: In order to place an order for products, the customer must register on the site using an online registration form.
Terms.registration_2: Any person may use the site, including making purchases through the site, subject to being competent to perform legally binding actions and holding a valid payment method.
Terms.registration_3: When registering on the site, the customer must enter a username and password as well as their email address.
Terms.registration_4: The Company may prevent any person from using the Site at its sole discretion in cases of: committing an illegal act, violation of terms and conditions, intentionally providing incorrect information, or performing actions that may harm the proper operation of the site.
Terms.purchasing_1: The purchase of the products will be made by adding products to the shopping cart and completing the checkout process.
Terms.purchasing_2: The order must include: first name, last name, telephone number, e-mail address, and delivery address details.
Terms.purchasing_3: In order to prevent any possibility of a delivery error, the customer must provide only accurate and correct details.
Terms.purchasing_4: Upon receipt of the order, the site will process the payment and issue a final confirmation of the order, subject to the availability of the products in stock.
Terms.purchasing_5: The customer will be charged for the product via the selected payment method, all subject to the availability of the products in the company's inventory.
Terms.payment_1: Payment for the products will be made by credit card or other available payment methods as offered on the site.
Terms.payment_2: After placing the order, the site management will check the payment method used and provide confirmation once approved.
Terms.payment_3: If the transaction is not approved, the customer will receive notification and the site management will contact the customer to complete or cancel the transaction.
Terms.payment_4: Approval of the purchase is conditional on the product being in stock. If the product is not available, the site management will refund any amount paid or cancel the charge.
Terms.payment_5: If the customer was mistakenly charged, the customer must notify the site management to make a credit accordingly.
Terms.delivery_1: The product will be delivered only after receiving payment confirmation.
Terms.delivery_2: The site management will do its best to deliver the products within the estimated delivery time as specified during the order process.
Terms.delivery_3: Delivery times only include business days (excluding weekends and holidays).
Terms.delivery_4: Deliveries are made by a courier company, and the courier company's terms will be binding on the customer.
Terms.delivery_5: Shipping fees will be charged in addition to the product price and will be displayed during checkout.
Terms.delivery_6: The site will not be responsible for delays in delivery caused by force majeure, war, natural disasters, strikes, or any reason beyond the control of the website.
Terms.delivery_7: The customer must immediately notify the site if the product has not been delivered within the specified delivery period.
Terms.delivery_8: Be sure to fill in accurate details. If products are returned due to incorrect details, the customer will be responsible for shipping fees.
Terms.cancellation_1: The customer may cancel the transaction in accordance with consumer protection laws.
Terms.cancellation_2: Cancellation must be made by written notification to the company's email address.
Terms.cancellation_3: Cancellation may not be possible for certain custom orders or special products.
Terms.cancellation_4: Cancellation is subject to the product being returned in its original packaging.
Terms.cancellation_5: After receiving the cancellation notice, the customer will be refunded minus applicable cancellation fees as specified by law.
Terms.cancellation_6: Return shipping costs will be paid by the customer or deducted from the refund amount.
Terms.warranty_1: The company does not bear liability for damages arising from the use of the products beyond the manufacturer's warranty.
Terms.warranty_2: The company does not bear liability for damages resulting from information published on external sites accessible through the site.
Terms.warranty_3: The company will not be liable for any activity of any other party that is not under its full control.
Terms.warranty_4: Product warranties are as specified by the manufacturer and will be honored according to the manufacturer's terms.
Terms.privacy_1: All personal details of the customer will be stored in the company's databases.
Terms.privacy_2: The company will not transfer customer information to third parties except as necessary to complete transactions.
Terms.privacy_3: Payment details will only be used for transaction purposes and will not be stored in the company's databases.
Terms.privacy_4: The company may use customer information for statistical analysis without identifying specific customers.
Terms.privacy_5: The company uses cookies to provide efficient service and save customer information for convenience.
Terms.copyright_1: All intellectual property rights, including copyrights, designs, and trademarks are the property of the Company.
Terms.copyright_2: These rights apply to the website name, domain name (effectparquet.com), product descriptions, images, and all content on the site.
Terms.copyright_3: You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, or use any content from the site without prior written permission.
Terms.copyright_4: Deep linking to specific pages requires approval from site management.
Terms.legal_1: The law applicable to these Terms and Conditions is Israeli law only.
Terms.legal_2: In any case of dispute, Israeli courts will have exclusive jurisdiction.
Terms.legal_3: All interpretations and enforcement of these regulations are subject to Israeli law.
Terms.contact_text: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us through our website or email.

ServicesContent.service_parquet_installation_desc: Professional parquet flooring installation of any complexity with a quality guarantee.
ServicesContent.service_parquet_installation_extra: We work with all types of parquet: solid, modular, artistic.
ServicesContent.service_material_calc_desc: Accurate calculation of the required amount of materials for your project.
ServicesContent.service_material_calc_extra: We consider the specifics of the room and the selected flooring.
ServicesContent.service_repair_desc: Restoration and repair of damaged parquet.
ServicesContent.service_repair_extra: Removal of scratches, chips, and replacement of damaged elements.

AboutContent.about_intro_1: We are a supplier of parquet flooring and installation services in Israel.
AboutContent.about_intro_2: Our company provides customers with top-quality materials and professional service.
AboutContent.about_mission_desc_1: To create cozy and durable flooring that delights our customers.
AboutContent.about_mission_desc_2: We strive to make the process of choosing and installing parquet as comfortable as possible.
AboutContent.about_advantages_2: • A professional team with years of experience
AboutContent.about_advantages_3: • Warranty on all types of work
AboutContent.about_values_1: • Quality in everything – from materials to service
AboutContent.about_values_2: • Honesty and transparency in working with clients

Description.product_description: The perfect combination of design and durability, this type of flooring can withstand any abrasion hazards, whether in commercial centers or home use. Berry Alloc laminated products combine aesthetics and advanced technology.
Description.product_notice: It is recommended to add an additional 10% to the amount needed for amortization during installation.
Description.delivery_policy_text: Possibility to receive the product within 2-3 working days from payment confirmation
